entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending this morning then cloudy. Wind light except north 40 km/h over southern sections. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. Forecast issued 05:37 AM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening and ending overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind light except north 40 km/h over southern sections. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 05:37 AM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023
